snippet.title: Super Mario Evolution | 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario Evolution was supposed to be a mod of New Super Mario Bros. U that replaced all the stages, tilesets and music in the original game, but as of 2024 the project has been cancelled.

Development on the mod was previously led by @WillyMaker, but as of late 2022 @Teltix assumed the role of director and lead level designer.

The music used in this trailer is an original medley made by one of our composers, @brickblock369https://youtu.be/lIFmpI6lbZU

Website: https://sme.nsmbu.net
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TeamSMEvolution

If you'd like to learn more about New Super Mario Bros. U (and Wii) modding in general, be sure to check out this Discord server: https://discord.gg/aZAaXVJ
Notably, this is *NOT* a Discord server dedicated to this mod in particular, this mod was named after the server, not the other way around.
